summary: Cyberpunk 2077 llegará también a la nueva generación de consolas
title: Cyberpunk 2077 llegará también a la nueva generación de consolas
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 llegará también a la nueva generación de consolas

Sin lugar a dudas, Cyberpunk 2077 es uno de los títulos más esperados en lo que queda de la actual generación de consolas. Pero, a tenor de lo indicado por CD Projekt RED en las últimas horas, también lo será de la primera hornada de juegos de PS5 y la sucesora de Xbox One.

El estudio polaco ha presentado sus resultados financieros para el año fiscal 2018 y en ellos se detalla el estado del…

tags: fingers crossed that the second cd projekt red game is about ciri
summary: The launch trailer wil probably come out on the daybreak, which is September 26th and the game will come out on October. That's...
question: The launch trailer wil probably come out on the daybreak, which is September 26th and the game will come out on October. That's my guess and it's very probable. This game is for sure not coming in summer. And this makes me kind of afraid of sales because the end of the year means Cyberpunk 2077 too (since it's confirmed to be released on this gen it has to come out this year) and we all know how big of a hype this title is. Not everyone can get 2 games in a short time.
answer:
Yeah, but consider this? I can’t wait until then for a trailer. Also they can probably give us something small, I’m fine with just a poster, anything. We don’t even have a trailer for the infected, they have kept quiet about all of that. Maybe they want it to be a surprise for the release but I doubt it. Also nothing about Joel yet. I hope we get something because it’s almost been a year since we got any news. Also naughty dog said that they will only announce the date when they are pretty much ready with the game because they don’t want to have to move the date. So we can get a surprise release date when we least expect it.

Yeah cyberpunk might be set for the end of the year (which yay). But I’m not afraid for the last of us, I’m sure that it will do amazing even if it’s released with cyberpunk. Tho I’m doubtful over how cd projekt red will manage to release 2 AAA games by 2021 when they haven’t even announced the second one yet. Have there been any updates on how far they are with cyberpunk? Because I think last time they said something about it, it was that the game wasn’t anywhere near done.

summary:
Ok ok ok so...if Cyberpunk 2077 is gonna have 3-5 ways to complete every (most) quest then y’know what that means?!
3-5...
body:
Ok ok ok so…if Cyberpunk 2077 is gonna have 3-5 ways to complete every (most) quest then y’know what that means?!

3-5 playthroughs! (At least!!)

Or emergency saves and a whole bunch of re-loading!!

body:
jackie: hey just warning you i flirt with a LOT of women but don’t get jealous, okay? it’s not that you’re unattractive it’s just i see you EVERY DAY. you’re like, my bro, so i don’t really see you as one of the girls y’know? sorry ;) try not to fall in love with me ;)

summary: CD Projekt RED è al lavoro su un altro AAA RPG?
title: CD Projekt RED è al lavoro su un altro AAA RPG?
body:
Iniziamo la settimana con una scoppiettante notizia per tutti i fan di #theWitcher e #Cyberpunk 2077. A cura del nostro Facultates

CD Projekt RED ha recentemente rivelato che sarebbe al lavoro su un altro AAA RPG, oltre Cyberpunk 2077. L’uscita è prevista, per entrambi, entro il 2021. Qui di seguito la dichiarazione della software house:

Per quanto riguarda i piani di CD Projekt RED per il periodo 2016-2021, i suoi piani per il rilascio del secondo gioco AAA entro il 2021 rimangono invariati. Attualmente ci stiamo…

tags: Cyberpunk 2077 no sería exclusivo de Epic Games Store
summary: Cyberpunk 2077 no sería exclusivo de Epic Games Store
title: Cyberpunk 2077 no sería exclusivo de Epic Games Store
body:
Epic Games Store se ha encargado de robarle el terreno a Steam cuando se trata de exclusivos, pues títulos como The Division 2, Metro: Exodus y recientemente Control son juegos que solo encuentras o encontrarás en la tienda de Epic Games. Ante tal hecho, un usuario de Twitter se lo ha preguntado a la cuenta oficial […]

La entrada Cyberpunk 2077 no sería exclusivo de Epic Games Store aparece primero en Versus Media México | Videojuegos, Cine, Tecnología, TV, Cultura..

blog.title: This City Will Bleed You Dry

summary:
Cyberpunk 2077 will be releasing by 2021 along with another AAA CD Projekt Red game. 
“As for the unannounced AAA title, CD...
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 will be releasing by 2021 along with another AAA CD Projekt Red game.

“As for the unannounced AAA title, CD Projekt has said it will “probably” return to the world of The Witcher, but that fans shouldn’t expect The Witcher 4.”

source

reblog.comment:
Cyberpunk 2077 will be releasing by 2021 along with another AAA CD Projekt Red game.

“As for the unannounced AAA title, CD Projekt has said it will “probably” return to the world of The Witcher, but that fans shouldn’t expect The Witcher 4.”

summary: Cyberpunk 2077 llegará en 2021
title: Cyberpunk 2077 llegará en 2021
body:
Cyberpunk 2077 llegará en 2021

La ventana de lanzamiento para Cyberpunk 2077 de CD Projekt Red se ha reducido ligeramente, pues el estudio ha confirmado el lanzamiento de dos juegos AAA para 2021.

GamesRadar + informa que la noticia llega a través de una publicación en el foro en la que el desarrollador afirma que tanto Cyberpunk 2077 así como un título nuevo no anunciado se estrenarán en los próximos dos años.

Cyberpunk 2077h…

blog.name: yousadclownofaman
blog.title: I’LL TWIST HIS WICKED SPIRE INTO CHICKEN WIRE
blog.description: Raf / Bloodshot [HE/HIM/HIS] - I really like Dungeons & Dragons, Illustration, and Concept Art. Currently working on two seperate 5th edition setttings; Wyrmspire & The Endless Dungeon. Keep an eye out for according tags! DISCLAIMER: no art tagged in any of my D&D tags will be used in any of my campaigns. I only tag for things that inspire me & use tags to organize my interests, and will not steal anybody’s characters or art for these purposes.

tags: pls note that the comments about Lust are not my opinion on sex workers
summary: ＣＹＢΞＲ ＳＩＮＮΞＲＳ ＯＦ ＴＨΞ ２３ＲＤ ＣΞＮＴＵＲＹ
title: ＣＹＢΞＲ ＳＩＮＮΞＲＳ ＯＦ ＴＨΞ ２３ＲＤ ＣΞＮＴＵＲＹ
body:
(Fun blurbs under the cut!)

Greed: “His vocal synthesizer hummed sub-sonics over the bank’s standard-issue headset, whispering endorphin-releasing frequencies as he suggests higher, more glamorous investment opportunities.”

Avarice: “Trophies of initiations from long-forgotten clades, body marked with scars and tattoos, microsoft cables and poorly skin-matched cybernetics. In his day the hardware wasn’t that good. You got what you got. But ever since he came down with that flu from overseas, he’s been different.”

Gluttony: “Their skull was about 75% metal; unparallelled skill in the Ripperdoc community had tracked this one’s progress from clinic to clinic, under noodle shacks and into video stores. They gossipped amongst themselves, how methodical and specific the requests for alignment, synchroniscity, were. This, ‘concrete crusader’ as the doctors eventually nicknamed them, was an antique shopper and a custom builder, tech seemingly tooled specifically for them.”

Sloth: “If he ran Jo-boy, y’know, he could stay under there for about a day and a half. Twenty-four, twenty-five hours. Staring dry-eyed up at the tempered interface bowl of information stream into his retinas. The juicebox he had for hydration had long biodegraded into an irritating powder that sucked the moisture from his skin like a vampire, but he was unaware. He worked all week at the plant making sure the bad screen worked so he could come home and enjoy his weekend of good screen.”

Pride: “Even if it’s grown on cloned shark colagin, it’s still fur. It’s still warm, it’s still mink, and it’s still expensive. Eurodollar signs scream down her scrolling vision into a blur, fingertips twitching as she swipes, selects, and adds to her cart. Money is no object and beauty is pain, is it not? And honey, she’s been hardwired for pain since her technicolor birth.”

Lust: “She was a street predator, swimming lazy arcs through the nightclub throngs of sweating humanity like a shark through a spawning pool. People are vulnerable when dopamine is thumping and she can smell it in the air. Vulnerability is a double-edged sword she’s weilded steadily through her life; honing one edge while she sinks the other into hot-blooded, yielding flesh.”

Wrath: “His surplus Russian heart growls in his chest when brass hits the floor. It’s his favorite song, don’t you know? Staccato barks of gunfire and the bubbling gurgle of bloodshed are his symphony. He relishes it. And when the last street boy lays shredded at his feet, eyes wild with terror, the thermoelastic clamps that keep that formidable maw shut, he knows the calling card he’s bound to turn into. Who else spends four K on a Chiba facelift like that?”
body_abstract: (Fun blurbs under the cut!)
